synopsis.text: Thus begins the extraordinary journey of Fable, an unrivaled hitman with an unparalleled talent for his deadly trade. After completing countless assignments, his prowess attracts unwanted attention, compelling his boss to assign him an unusual task: to live a normal life for one year. Adopting a new identity as Akira Satou, accompanied by his driver posing as his sister Youko, Fable must navigate the complexities of ordinary life while suppressing his natural instincts. The stakes are high, as any deviation from this non-violent path will result in dire consequences. Embark on this thrilling adventure as Akira and Youko strive to maintain their cover, proving that sometimes, the most challenging mission is simply staying alive.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
